metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: The DROP COLUMN command is used to delete a column in an existing table.
content.html: The DROP COLUMN command is used to delete a column in an existing table.

content.text: The following SQL deletes the "ContactName" column from the "Customers" table:
content.html: The following SQL deletes the "ContactName" column from the "Customers" table:

content.code_html:
ALTER TABLE Customers
DROP COLUMN ContactName;

content.text: To drop a UNIQUE constraint, use the following SQL:
content.html: To drop a UNIQUE constraint, use the following SQL:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
ALTER TABLE Persons
DROP CONSTRAINT UC_Person;

content.code:

content.code_html:

syntax_highlighting_data.text:

content.text: The DROP DEFAULT command is used to delete a DEFAULT constraint.
content.html: The DROP DEFAULT command is used to delete a DEFAULT constraint.

content.text: To drop a DEFAULT constraint, use the following SQL:
content.html: To drop a DEFAULT constraint, use the following SQL:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
ALTER TABLE Persons
ALTER COLUMN City DROP DEFAULT;

content.code:
ALTER TABLE Persons
ALTER COLUMN City DROP DEFAULT;

syntax_highlighting.text:
ALTER TABLE Persons
ALTER COLUMN City DROP DEFAULT;

content.code_html:
ALTER TABLE Persons
ALTER COLUMN City DROP DEFAULT;

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
ALTER TABLE Persons
ALTER COLUMN City DROP DEFAULT;

syntaxHighlighting.text:
ALTER TABLE Persons
ALTER City DROP DEFAULT;

content.code:

syntax_highlighting.text:

ALTER City DROP DEFAULT;

content.code_html:

syntax_highlighting_data.text:

ALTER City DROP DEFAULT;

content.text: The DROP INDEX command is used to delete an index in a table.
content.html: The DROP INDEX command is used to delete an index in a table.

content.code_html: DROP INDEX index_name ON table_name;
DROP INDEX table_name.index_name;
DROP INDEX index_name;

ALTER TABLE table_name
DROP INDEX index_name;

content.text: The DROP DATABASE command is used is to delete an existing SQL database.
content.html: The DROP DATABASE command is used is to delete an existing SQL database.

content.text: The following SQL drops a database named "testDB":
content.html: The following SQL drops a database named "testDB":

content.code_html: DROP DATABASE testDB;

content.text: Note: Be careful before dropping a database. Deleting a database will result in loss of complete information stored in the database!
content.html: Note: Be careful before dropping a database. Deleting a database will result in loss of complete information stored in the database!

content.text: The DROP TABLE command deletes a table in the database.
content.html: The DROP TABLE command deletes a table in the database.

content.text: The following SQL deletes the table "Shippers":

content.code_html: DROP TABLE Shippers;

content.text: Note : Be careful before deleting a table. Deleting a table results in loss of all information stored in the table!
content.html: Note: Be careful before deleting a table. Deleting a table results in loss of all information stored in the table!

content.text: The DROP VIEW command deletes a view.
The following SQL drops the "Brazil Customers" view:
content.html: The following SQL drops the "Brazil Customers" view:

content.code_html: DROP VIEW [Brazil Customers];
